member.name: DWM_BLURBEHIND
member.summary: Specifies Desktop Window Manager (DWM) blur-behind properties. Used by the function.

member.name: DWM_BLURBEHIND.dwFlags
member.summary: A bitwise combination of DWM Blur Behind constant values that indicates which of the members of this structure have been set.

member.name: DWM_BLURBEHIND.fEnable
member.summary: TRUE to register the window handle to DWM blur behind; FALSE to unregister the window handle from DWM blur behind.

member.name: DWM_BLURBEHIND.hRgnBlur
member.summary: The region within the client area where the blur behind will be applied. A NULL value will apply the blur behind the entire client area.

member.name: DWM_BLURBEHIND.fTransitionOnMaximized
member.summary: TRUE if the window's colorization should transition to match the maximized windows; otherwise, FALSE.
